channel.title: Queston in making a moparscape private server
channel.description:
hey, I downloaded the moparscape private server thing, i created a new server. i logged in, and im the owner,, my rights are 3. but like when i go to the files to edit my guy, i edit it, and save, but they dont work. and how do i make server so i cna play with other? can someone else give me theirs.. if they arnt gonna sue it anymore if thats even possible? sorry, im just really confused, and i love this game, and want to make a kick ass server with other people. lol thanks.
-Matt.

no im not using that account. i made my own… but its all good. im co-owner on gnarlycakespk.no-ip.biz the owner is awesome. i was on it for 3 days and im co-owner. lmao
